code: import{createSelector}from'reselect';var selectShop=function selectShop(state){return state.shop;};export var selectCollection=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return shop.collections;});export var selectCollectionForPreview=createSelector([selectCollection],function(collections){return Object.keys(collections).map(function(key){return collections[key];});});export var selectionCollection=function selectionCollection(collectionUrlParam){return createSelector([selectCollection],function(collections){return collections[collectionUrlParam];});};
